mods.note: TO THE ROUTES IN PERSIA, VOLUME ill, PART I. GENERAL STAFF, INDIA. Cat. No. C. P. 68. Case No. 15082. SIMLA: PRINTED AT THE GOVERNMENT MONOTYPE PRESS. 1918.: —— ' _______—______ , I - — —

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'INDEX TO THE ROUTES IN PERSIA, VOLUME III, PART I.'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the last folio with 56; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.Pagination: the volume also contains an original printed pagination sequence.

mods.abstract: The volume is a Government of India official publication entitled Index to the Routes in Persia Volume III, Part I. General Staff India(Simla: Government Monotype Press, 1918).The volume consists of an index to place names.
